dcterms:description: PASCAL VOC 2012 is a dataset used for object detection and segmentation, containing 20 foreground object classes and 1 background class, with a total of 1,464 training images.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012

dcterms:description: MS COCO 2014 is a large-scale dataset for object detection, segmentation, and captioning, containing 80 object classes and 1 background class, with 80,000 training images.
dcterms:title: MS COCO 2014
